name: 3albii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w1))))

stmt.origin: albii(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w1))))
-| wb(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w1))))
-| wb(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w1))))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Inference adding three universal quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 10-Aug-2018.)
